title: The Everliving Daughter of Valnocia Manor
description: Rune is the sole daughter and master of the notorious Valnocia family. She also commands a team of sure-shots and elite mercenaries, which has earned the house a certain enviable reputation. But rumors say Rune possesses a curious ability, and some call her a monster for it. As forces conspire to bring about a dark goal, a new face joins the extended family, uncovering many more mysterious secrets that lurk in the shadows of Valnocia Manor. TappyToon presents the exclusive, worldwide debut of 'Valnocia,' featuring striking artwork and a fresh cast of bold characters.
